mapper.select: select orderstatus, nvl(count(orderstatus),0) ordercount from orderdetail where orderconfirm >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by orderstatus
select nvl(sum(realpayment),0) realpayment, sum(count(orderdate)) ordercount from ordertbl where orderdate >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') group by realpayment, orderdate
select infotitle, to_char(infowritedate, 'YY-MM-DD') infowritedate from (select * from notice order by infowritedate desc) where rownum <= 6
select nvl(sum(count(*)),0) qmanswer from qmboard where qmanswer is null group by qmdate
select nvl(sum(count(*)),0) waiting from seller where regiapproval = 1 group by regiapproval
select nvl(sum(count(*)),0) regiapproval from seller where regiapproval = 2 and regiapprovaldate >= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by regiapproval
select nvl(sum(count(reportdate)),0) reportOver from report where reportdate > to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and reportselect =1 group by reportdate
select nvl(sum(count(reportdate)),0) reportWaiting from report where reportselect = 1 group by reportdate

select
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-1), 'YYYY-MM') salesMonth,
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-2), 'YYYY-MM') salesMonth,
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-3), 'YYYY-MM') salesMonth,
sum(realpayment) salesSellerSum, sum(realpayment)*0.05 salesAdminSum, count(ordernum) salesTrend from ordertbl where orderdate between
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), 0), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-2), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-3), 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE), -2), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
